t: AWS IoT Core Features
s: 2 weeks ago - The Message Broker is a high throughput ... of your IoT devices and applications with low latency based on the MQTT Version 5.0 Message Standard. The flexible nature of the Message Broker’s topic structure helps you send messages to, or receive messages from, a number of devices. It supports messaging patterns ranging from one-to-one command and control messaging, to one-to-one million (or more) broadcast notification systems and everything in between. Also, you can set up fine-grained ...
